mal:enumeration.name: InteractionType
mal:enumeration.comment: InteractionType is an enumeration holding the possible interaction pattern types.

mal:enumeration.name: SessionType
mal:enumeration.comment: SessionType is an enumeration holding the session types.

mal:enumeration.name: QoSLevel
mal:enumeration.comment: QoSLevel is an enumeration holding the possible QoS levels.

mal:item.comment: Used for Best Effort QoS Level.

mal:enumeration.name: UpdateType
mal:enumeration.comment: UpdateType is an enumeration holding the possible Update types.

mal:item.comment: Update is notification of the creation of the item.
Update is just a periodic update of the item and has not changed its value.
Update is for a changed value or modification of the item.
Update is notification of the removal of the item.
